segments.text: I'd like to request some more amenities .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Amenities ? What do you mean by amenities , sir ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , the free stuff ! You know the soap , lotion , shampoo , etc .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I see . Sir , if I may ask . Have you used up all the amenities in your room ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Not at all . I still have enough for the next few days .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Then what is the problem , sir ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I need some to keep as souvenirs !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , souvenirs . Trinkets to remember my trip by !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We do have a souvenir shop on the first floor , sir .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , that's not the same . I never pay for hotel souvenirs !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll call housekeeping . Someone will be up with more amenities shortly .
segments.speaker: S2
